newsitem.title: FINLAND: SISU, RENAULT SET TO SIGN TRUCK DEAL.
newsitem.headline: SISU, RENAULT SET TO SIGN TRUCK DEAL.

text.p: Finnish state-owned vehicle manufacturer Sisu Oy said on Wednesday it planned to sign a joint venture deal with French car and truck maker Renault SA's truck unit on Monday January 20.
A Sisu spokeswoman said the companies will sign a pact on a sales and servicing venture for both of their lorries, as outlined in a letter of intent announced last June.

Sisu said then the companies would establish a 50-50 joint venture to handle sales of both of their trucks in Finland, the Baltic and nearby regions of Russia, with annual sales of about 650 million markka. -- Helsinki newsroom +35 89 6805 0247
